document_data.name: Syussa Broar
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web/Astral Encounters/Heroes of Crosswinds Keep Part 2}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Syussa Broar''' was one of the [[Stalwart Lions]], the masters of [[Crosswinds Keep]] as of {{yearlink|1372}}.
document_data.Description: He was slim but muscular, with dark hair and a well-trimmed beard. He always dressed well, measured 5'3" and weighed {{SI|120|pounds|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Possessions: His bedchamber in the upper floor of [[Crosswinds Keep]] held two golden lion sculptures flanking his bed, gilt curtains, and expensive rugs. He also kept a collection of locks in the room.{{Cite web/Astral Encounters/Crosswinds Keep Upper Floor and Catacombs}}
document_data.Activities: He sometimes traded tales with people at Crosswinds Keep. He was most often called to entertain socially conscious visitors to the keep.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Stalwart Lions]].
document_data.History: Syussa joined the [[Stalwart Lions]] while fleeing from a bounty hunter from [[Cormyr]], where he'd stolen something from a wealthy house in [[Arabel]], earning himself a 2,000 [[gp]] bounty on his head. After a few months, the bounty hunter abandoned the chase, but Syussa remained with the Lions.
